languages.text: "Тщеславие затмило мой разум. Я думала, раз стала Вторым ткачом культа, раз Неумирающий благоволил мне, раз я сильна... то знаю все. Это мое наказание за гордыню и глупость".

"Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."
languages.original_text: "Тщеславие затмило мой разум. Я думала, раз стала Вторым ткачом культа, раз Неумирающий благоволил мне, раз я сильна... то знаю все. Это мое наказание за гордыню и глупость".

traits.locale_text: "Hubris had clouded my mind. I thought, because I had been made Second Weaver, because the Undying Emperor favoured me, because I was strong... I thought I knew everything. This is punishment for my pride and stupidity."

"Hubris had clouded my mind. I thought, because I had been made Second Weaver, because the Undying Emperor favoured me, because I was strong... I thought I knew everything. This is punishment for my pride and stupidity."

"Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Weaver and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

"Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

languages.text: «El orgullo me nubló el juicio. Creí que lo sabía todo. Se me concedieron el título de Segunda Tejedora y el favor del Inmortal... pero mi orgullo fue mi perdición. Este es el castigo por mi arrogancia y mi estupidez».
languages.original_text: "Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

traits.locale_text: «El orgullo me nubló el juicio. Creí que lo sabía todo. Se me concedieron el título de Segunda Tejedora y el favor del Inmortal... pero mi orgullo fue mi perdición. Este es el castigo por mi arrogancia y mi estupidez».

languages.text: 「傲慢さが私の頭を曇らせた。私は何でも知っていると思っていた。第二の織り手の称号を与えられ、不死の者の寵愛を受けて…でも、私のプライドが破滅を招いた。これは私の傲慢さと愚かさに対する罰よ」
languages.original_text: "Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

traits.locale_text: 「傲慢さが私の頭を曇らせた。私は何でも知っていると思っていた。第二の織り手の称号を与えられ、不死の者の寵愛を受けて…でも、私のプライドが破滅を招いた。これは私の傲慢さと愚かさに対する罰よ」

languages.text: “傲慢蒙蔽了我的头脑。我自以为我无所不知，我被授予了次席织网者的称号，得到了不死之神的青睐……但我的自傲却让我蒙辱。眼下的一切，一定是在惩罚我的狂妄和愚蠢。”
languages.original_text: "Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

traits.locale_text: “傲慢蒙蔽了我的头脑。我自以为我无所不知，我被授予了次席织网者的称号，得到了不死之神的青睐……但我的自傲却让我蒙辱。眼下的一切，一定是在惩罚我的狂妄和愚蠢。”

languages.text: "Hochmut vernebelte meinen Geist. Ich dachte, ich wüsste alles. Ich erhielt den Titel der Zweiten Spinnerin und die Gunst des Todlosen ... aber mein Stolz war mein Untergang. Das hier ist die Strafe für meine Arroganz und Dummheit."
languages.original_text: "Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

traits.locale_text: "Hochmut vernebelte meinen Geist. Ich dachte, ich wüsste alles. Ich erhielt den Titel der Zweiten Spinnerin und die Gunst des Todlosen ... aber mein Stolz war mein Untergang. Das hier ist die Strafe für meine Arroganz und Dummheit."

languages.text: « Je me suis laissée aveugler par l'orgueil. Je croyais tout savoir sur tout. J'ai eu le privilège de recevoir le titre de deuxième tisseuse et la faveur de l'Immortel... mais mon arrogance a scellé ma perte. Tel est le châtiment de ma suffisance et de ma bêtise. »
languages.original_text: "Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis laissée aveugler par l'orgueil. Je croyais tout savoir sur tout. J'ai eu le privilège de recevoir le titre de deuxième tisseuse et la faveur de l'Immortel... mais mon arrogance a scellé ma perte. Tel est le châtiment de ma suffisance et de ma bêtise. »

languages.original_text: "Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."

languages.text: "Kibirden gözüm kör olmuş. Her şeyi bildiğimi sanırdım. Bana İkinci Dokur ünvanı ve Ölmeyen'in lütfu bahşedilmişti... Oysa gururum yüzünden varımı yoğumu yitirdim. Bu da kibrimin ve aptallığımın cezasıdır."
languages.original_text: "Hubris clouded my mind. I thought I knew everything. I was granted the title of Second Spinner and the favour of the Undying One... but my pride was my undoing. This is the punishment for my arrogance and stupidity."
